title: Was Daniel Radcliffe of the Harry Potter Championship and the cursed child?
subtitle: April's cheating day prank, which includes a fan-made film poster, left some fans of Harry Potter's disillusioned world.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In April 2018, Daniel Radcliffe announced that he would reenact his role as Harry Potter in a new film called "Harry Potter and the Damn Child."
